reviews.review_msg: Jason is organized and I enjoyed his teaching style, he used this website called poll everywhere for students to share their questions and he would address them to the class.The course itself is quite difficult and challenging, especially due to the ever changing nature of web analytics. Overall, a great and kind teacher but the course is tough.

Jason has some really great industry knowledge that adds value to his lectures! I genuinely learned in this class (but you definitely get out what you put into it). The class discussions, readings and tutorials can be time-consuming but worth it overall!

Jason cares about his students, and is passionate about what he does. Lectures are given in tutorials and are a little dry, but he tries to make them fun and engaging. This leaves no time for working on weekly assignments during tutorial. There are also weekly quizzes based on readings, and a huge final group project. No midterm, but there is final
I WILL NEVER TAKE ANY COURSE WITH THIS GUY EVER AGAIN! I have never suffered so much in any course at SFU
Jason is a very hard marker. Assignments are unrelated and require way too much time. Find a different prof. if you can!
He's passionate about his subject but it is extremely difficult to understand him. His coursework is very hard. Be ready to spend alot of time doing assignments for this class.
Jason's lectures are okay but he is a very tough marker. I wouldn't take the course with him.
